entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as someone who has always risked everything to see and help Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who is yelling for Sirius as though his life depends on it.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as someone Harry is struggling against.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as the one who has most of the remaining Death Eaters grouped in the middle of the room.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is described as someone who is attempting to revive Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as someone who is lying on the ground and Mad-Eye Moody is trying to revive her.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is described as someone who has run forward to continue Sirius's duel with Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as someone who is dueling with Kingsley.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as someone who has slid down the stone benches to where Harry stands.

relationships.description: Harry is helped by Sirius, as mentioned in the text: 'Sirius had risked everything, always, to see Harry,  to help him'.
Harry is struggling against Lupin, as mentioned in the text: 'Harry was no longer struggling against Lupin'.
Mad-Eye Moody is trying to revive Tonks, as mentioned in the text: 'Mad-Eye Moody had crawled across the room to where Tonks lay and was attempting to revive her'.
Kingsley is dueling with Bellatrix, as mentioned in the text: 'Kingsley had run forward to continue Sirius’s duel with Bellatrix'.
Kingsley is continuing the duel of Sirius, as mentioned in the text: 'Kingsley had run forward to continue Sirius’s duel with Bellatrix'.
Dumbledore is controlling the Death Eaters, as mentioned in the text: 'Dumbledore had most of the remaining Death Eaters grouped in the middle of the room'.
